citrus.citrus greening: Use disease-free seedlings and control psyllids.
citrus.root rot: Plant in well-drained soil and avoid overwatering.

tomato.blight: Rotate crops yearly and avoid wet foliage.
tomato.powdery mildew: Ensure good air circulation and lower humidity.

lettuce.downy mildew: Provide ample spacing and water early in the day.
lettuce.lettuce drop: Use clean transplants and remove plant debris.

strawberry.powdery mildew: Plant resistant varieties and reduce humidity.
strawberry.botrytis: Improve airflow and remove dead berries.

spinach.downy mildew: Use resistant cultivars and irrigate at soil level.
spinach.leaf spot: Avoid overhead watering and remove infected leaves.

cucumber.powdery mildew: Plant in full sun and space plants properly.
cucumber.bacterial wilt: Control cucumber beetles and remove infected vines.

pepper.powdery mildew: Maintain low humidity and provide air movement.
pepper.bacterial spot: Use certified seed and avoid working when leaves are wet.

arugula.downy mildew: Rotate crops and avoid excessive moisture.

blueberry.mummy berry: Rake and destroy mummified fruit to break the cycle.
